
.. _program_listing_file_include_types_table_t.h:

Program Listing for File table_t.h
==================================

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Return to documentation for file <file_include_types_table_t.h>` (``include/types/table_t.h``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS

.. code-block:: cpp

   #pragma once
   
   #include <vector>
   #include "codi.hpp"
   
   #include "include/microphysics/constants.h"
   
   // A 4D lookup table
   template<class float_t>
   struct table_t{
       uint64_t n1;
       uint64_t n2;
       uint64_t n3;
       uint64_t n4;
   
       std::vector<float_t> x1; 
       std::vector<float_t> x2; 
       std::vector<float_t> x3; 
       std::vector<float_t> x4; 
       float_t dx1; 
       float_t dx2; 
       float_t dx3; 
       float_t dx4; 
       float_t odx1; 
       float_t odx2; 
       float_t odx3; 
       float_t odx4; 
       std::vector<float_t> table; 
       table_t();
   
       float_t get(
           const uint64_t i,
           const uint64_t j,
           const uint64_t k,
           const uint64_t l) const;
   };
